thread.title: Allen & Krista Seiter
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Allen & Krista Seiter

author: Allen & Krista Seiter
title: Allen & Krista Seiter
text: Excellent service throughout the whole buying process and delivery. The furniture looks great and we feel like we got an excellent value. We definitely will be buying from Gardner White for or future furniture needs.
